ActionParnip: where press ctrl+alt+f2 ?: He means for you to hold down the Ctrl and Alt keys while hitting F2 key
You have about 7 terminals you can use (tty1-tty7).  To go to tty2,  Ctrl-Alt-F2.  To go back to tty1, Ctrl-Alt-F1  (or Alt-Left-Arrow)
Alt-Right or Left arrow will usually take you to the next console terminal up or down.
